name: AWIC
tag_list: cloud-computing, subscription-it, virtualisation, consolidation, it-management, it-advisory, it-architecture, hosted-desktop
overview:
AWIC Desktop is a subscription-based IT service for small and medium businesses, which is hosted in “the cloud”. The service provides businesses with an enterprise-class IT infrastructure for a monthly fee and provides a number of benefits, including:

  • Savings on IT infrastructure hardware and maintenance
  • Improved security for business data
  • Seamlessly integrated company IT
  • Reduction of on-site IT support staff
  • Elimination of server upgrades and maintenance
  • Reduction of wasted IT purchases
  • Savings on computer power consumption

Advisory services:

SMB AWIC provides clear, practical advice on IT for small and medium businesses with their AWIC Technical Advisory service.

Enterprise For larger companies, AWIC offers operational and technical project management to deliver optimised IT infrastructures and efficient support teams with the AWIC Enterprise service.
